actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Telecommunication, Consumer Protection and Finance.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Consumer Protection and Finance

official_title: A bill to amend section 303 of the Communications Act of 1934 to require that radios be capable of receiving both amplitude modulated (AM) and frequency modulated (FM) broadcasts.

summary.text: Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to authorize the Federal Communications Commission to require that radios be capable of receiving all AM and FM frequencies. Exempts radios costing less than $15 from such requirement.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 303 of the Communications Act of 1934 to require that radios be capable of receiving both amplitude modulated (AM) and frequency modulated (FM) broadcasts.
